At the Student Centre, we collected donations and spoke about our initiative while giving out roses for free. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We would like to thank everyone for coming to pick up a rose; we had a wonderful time connecting with everyone! There was a large turnout, and we are happy to see everyone's enthusiasm and support in making this event possible. If you want to help out with future donations, stay tuned for more upcoming events.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: We successfully held our 2024 Roses for Toronto Event, collected donations, and spread awareness about BTO!
